items.title: IndyCar champion Palou ordered to pay McLaren £9m
items.snippet: Four-time IndyCar champion Alex Palou on Friday was ordered to pay McLaren more than £9m in the breach of contract suit the team filed when the Spaniard backed out of two different deals with the racing team.

items.title: Grealish has stress fracture

items.title: Glasner committed to Palace after talks
